mapper.select: SELECT r.rprfid, r.state, r.date, COALESCE(r.time, '00:00') AS time, COALESCE(r.time2, NULL) AS time2, r.hallid, h.halladdress, p.prfnm, h.allseatcnt AS allSeatCnt FROM rprf r JOIN hall h ON r.hallid = h.hallid JOIN performance p ON r.prfid = p.prfid WHERE r.prfid = #{prfid} AND r.date = #{date}

SELECT r.reservationid , r.userid , p.prfnm , DATE_FORMAT(r.rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reservationDate, r.state , r.quantity FROM reservation r JOIN rprf rp ON r.rprfid = rp.rprfid JOIN performance p ON rp.prfid = p.prfid ORDER BY r.rdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{perPage}

SELECT h.allseatcnt - IFNULL(COUNT(res.reservationid), 0) AS remaining_seats FROM hall h JOIN rprf r ON h.hallid = r.hallid LEFT JOIN reservation res ON r.rprfid = res.rprfid WHERE r.rprfid = #{rprfid} GROUP BY h.allseatcnt;
